subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Larry Brown-Bobcats divorce seemed so ordinary, so unspectacular, so unworthy of the Brown legacy. Or maybe the bar was set too high in his last breakup.
snippet: The Larry Brown-Bobcats divorce seemed so ordinary, so unspectacular, so unworthy of the Brown legacy. Or maybe the bar was set too high in his last breakup.
